channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Nifty News: Assassin’s Creed unveils ‘smart collectibles’, MechaFightClub winds down and more ….
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: NFT game MechaFightClub is shutting down due to the regulatory uncertainty in the U.S., while Yuga Lab’s new CEO has snapped up a BAYC NFT well over the floor price.

item.title: Bakkt delists majority of tokens from recently acquired Apex Crypto platform
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The delisting included major tokens used in DeFi; the company said it was following “up-to-date regulatory guidance.”

item.title: US lawmakers target perceived risks of crypto adoption in El Salvador with reintroduced bill
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The legislation appeared to be another attempt at the Accountability for Cryptocurrency in El Salvador Act, originally introduced after the country's Bitcoin Law was enacted.

item.title: Binance calls it quits in Canada, blames new rules
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Binance is the latest in a string of departures from CEO Changpeng Zhao’s home country; it promises to keep working with regulators.

item.title: LG Electronics files patent for NFT-trading TV
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The information was published on WIPO's global database for intellectual property on May 11, 18 months after LG filed its application.

item.title: Coinbase establishes advisory council with former US lawmakers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Former Senator Patrick Toomey, former Representative Tim Ryan, former Representative Sean Patrick Maloney, and others will advise Coinbase on crypto policies.

item.title: How will lower interest rates benefit Bitcoin?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman explains how lowering the interest rates in the U.S. will ultimately benefit Bitcoin and the cryptocurrency market.

item.title: The US should promote USDC — before it's too late
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alex O’Donnell
item.description: USDC brings stability to cryptocurrency. It would behoove the financial system if policymakers took measures to foster its adoption.

item.title: BitDAO proposes to replace BIT token in branding revamp
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: After community approval, BIT holders will undergo a token-conversion process for the new Mantle token. Governance and treasury management will remain unchanged.

item.title: MakerDAO publishes 5-phase roadmap featuring funding for open-source AI projects
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: DAI stablecoin proprietor MakerDAO offered up an AI-heavy roadmap for the future with plans for a new blockchain.

item.title: President Biden announces nominations for key positions at Federal Reserve
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Leadership at the Fed will likely have an impact on how the U.S. government handles the potential issuance of a central bank digital currency.

item.title: Price analysis 5/12: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and most major altcoins are slumping, but the charts suggest that a recovery could be around the corner.

item.title: Florida governor signs CBDC bill into law, restricting some uses of US and foreign CBDCs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The new law, signed by Governor Ron DeSantis, also urges other states to take action against the potential introduction of CBDCs through their commercial codes.

item.title: NBCUniversal veteran will replace Elon Musk as Twitter CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Elon Musk announced his departure as Twitter CEO on May 11, suggesting his replacement would be a woman who would take over within roughly six weeks.

item.title: Bitcoin's dive under $27K liquidates $100M — So why aren't margin traders flipping bearish?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: BTC price falls below the 55-day support level at $27,000, but futures market resilience sparks hope for a recovery toward $28,000.

item.title: Web3 community-building meets music technology at Wavelengths Summit 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jonathan DeYoung
item.description: Crypto natives and newbies alike came together to build community and share alpha on the latest in music technology and decentralization.

item.title: How to protect your identity online
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Strategies like using strong passwords, enabling 2FA, avoiding phishing, using VPNs, keeping software up-to-date and using reputable antivirus may help one against online fraud.

item.title: What is Pepecoin and can it flip memecoins Dogecoin and Shiba Inu?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Pepecoin is a new meme-inspired cryptocurrency that's growing faster than Shiba Inu in its early days thanks to some big-name exchange listings.

item.title: New tech could make crypto and Web3 wallets more convenient
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Developers are working on ways to get rid of seed words and even private keys, while still keeping users in control.

item.title: UAE infrastructure for crypto is more ‘business-friendly’ than the US, says exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong and Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse also expressed their sentiments over U.S. regulation at the Dubai Fintech Summit.

item.title: Forget Cambridge Analytica — Here’s how AI could threaten elections
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: While disinformation is an ongoing issue that social media has only contributed to, AI could make it much easier for bad actors to spread disinformation.

item.title: Terra Luna founder Do Kwon’s bail terms officially accepted by Montenegro court
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The Montenegro court accepted the offered bail of $436,000 per person for Do Kwon and his former aide Han Chang-joon.

item.title: ‘Don’t short when it’s dark green’ — How to trade the 2024 Bitcoin halving
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is setting up a classic four-year buying opportunity, commentators say, with the next halving just one year away.

item.title: SEC beyond crypto: HSBC and Scotia hit with fines over WhatsApp use
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Both HSBC and Scotiabank have not been supportive of cryptocurrency adoption in recent years.

item.title: Romania harnesses AI for data-driven policy recommendations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Officials in Romania have created and employed an AI-powered robot to source community concerns and turn the collected data into policy recommendations.

item.title: Texas votes to add crypto to state’s Bill of Rights
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Texas lawmakers vote to add digital currency to the state’s Bill of Rights, granting individuals the right to use digital currencies like Bitcoin for trading.

item.title: Bitcoin enters $26K ‘bearadise’ as BTC price approaches 2-month lows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price action is now retesting its key 200-week moving average after holding it as support since March.

item.title: Crypto VCs made $2.6B worth of deals in the first quarter of 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Valuation trends in the report are mixed, with seed rounds up 33.3% and late-stage rounds up 209.2% compared with 2022; however, early-stage rounds are down 16.7%.

item.title: Lufthansa, Eurowings, other travel industry players push forward with Web3
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: After a new travel-focused blockchain hit the scene, major players in the industry are beginning to pivot to integrate Web3 technology.

item.title: ‘It’s going to get worse for banks’ — JPMorgan CEO on overregulation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: JPMorgan CEO says the Fed should be less focused on adding more rules and regulations for banks and more on fixing the banking crisis.
